Uses of Interface
jalse.actions.MutableActionContext

  • Packages that use MutableActionContext 
    Package Description
    jalse
    This is the JALSE parent package.
    jalse.actions
    This package is for scheduling and managing Action (like Runnable but with a ActionContext and potentially associated actor).
    jalse.entities
    This package is for creating and storing Entity within EntityContainer.

    • Uses of MutableActionContext in jalse

      Methods in jalse that return MutableActionContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> MutableActionContext<T> JALSE.newContext(Action<T> action) 
      MutableActionContext<JALSE> JALSE.scheduleForActor(Action<JALSE> action, long initialDelay, long period, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit) 

    • Uses of MutableActionContext in jalse.actions

      Classes in jalse.actions that implement MutableActionContext 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractFutureActionContext<T>
      An abstract implementation of MutableActionContext that is designed to be used with ExecutorService.
      class  AbstractManualActionContext<T>
      A abstract implementation of MutableActionContext that is designed to be used manually.
      protected class  ForkJoinActionEngine.ForkJoinContext<T>
      Fork join context.
      protected class  ManualActionEngine.ManualContext<T>
      Manual action context.
      protected class  ThreadPoolActionEngine.ThreadPoolContext<T>
      Thread pool context.
      Fields in jalse.actions declared as MutableActionContext 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static MutableActionContext Actions.EMPTY_ACTIONCONTEXT
      An empty MutableActionContext instance.
      Methods in jalse.actions that return MutableActionContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MutableActionContext<?> MultiActionBuilder.buildAndSchedule(ActionEngine engine)
      Builds and schedules the multi-action.
      MutableActionContext<T> MultiActionBuilder.buildAndSchedule(ActionEngine engine, T actor)
      Builds and schedules the multi-action for a supplied actor.
      static <T> MutableActionContext<T> Actions.emptyActionContext()
      Creates an immutable empty MutableActionContext.
      <T> MutableActionContext<T> ThreadPoolActionEngine.newContext(Action<T> action) 
      <T> MutableActionContext<T> ManualActionEngine.newContext(Action<T> action) 
      <T> MutableActionContext<T> ForkJoinActionEngine.newContext(Action<T> action) 
      <T> MutableActionContext<T> ActionEngine.newContext(Action<T> action)
      Creates an action context to define how the action will be scheduled for execution.
      default MutableActionContext<?> ActionEngine.schedule(Action<?> action)
      Schedules an action for immediate execution.
      default <T> MutableActionContext<T> ActionEngine.schedule(Action<T> action, T actor)
      Schedules an action referencing an actor for immediate execution.
      default MutableActionContext<T> ActionScheduler.scheduleForActor(Action<T> action)
      Schedules an action for immediate execution.
      MutableActionContext<T> DefaultActionScheduler.scheduleForActor(Action<T> action, long initialDelay, long period, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit) 
      MutableActionContext<T> ActionScheduler.scheduleForActor(Action<T> action, long initialDelay, long period, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      Schedules an action for execution with a supplied initial delay and repeat period.
      default MutableActionContext<T> ActionScheduler.scheduleForActor(Action<T> action, long initialDelay, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      Schedules an action to be executed after the supplied delay.
      static <T> MutableActionContext<T> Actions.unmodifiableActionContext(MutableActionContext<T> context)
      Creates an immutable MutableActionContext that ActionContext.cancel() and await() can still be called.
      Methods in jalse.actions with parameters of type MutableActionContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> void Actions.copy(ActionContext<T> source, MutableActionContext<T> target)
      Copies context information to a target context (actor, bindings, initial delay and period).
      static <T> MutableActionContext<T> Actions.unmodifiableActionContext(MutableActionContext<T> context)
      Creates an immutable MutableActionContext that ActionContext.cancel() and await() can still be called.
